item.title: SBGI
item.description: Andy asked: Hey Vin, what do you think of SBG (Sinclair Broadcast Group) Its the company that owns Channels 18 and 24(my employer). Andy I took a quick look at SBGI and would probably avoid it. The first place I always look is the market cap. At 700 million, it’s a little bigger than the companies I’m investing in. The second place I look is the balance sheet and SBGI’s scares me.
